about_the_game:
"Saddle Up and Drive" is a game set in the 1970s, where you play as the reckless nephew of an old car racer, now an alcoholic and neck-deep in debt.



The full game features a multitude of missions, vehicles to purchase, and various additional maps. In the demo, you'll have access to only one vehicle and can engage in syrup smuggling at the only distillery available, just a short distance from your uncle's farm. You'll experience breathtaking chases with the county police on busy roads, both day and night.



Explore a vast open world; in this demo, you'll have access to the entire central map, without any limits, and you'll find a lot of interesting hidden details!



And remember! This game is best played with a controller, but you can still use a mouse and keyboard. Saddle Up and Drive is constantly being developed; if you want to stay updated, click 'Follow' on the full game's page!

content_descriptors.notes: In this game, there are references to committing crimes (smuggling, illegal races), and vehicle collisions are shown. The death of people is never explicitly shown, but it can be implied as a result of vehicle collisions. There are references to alcohol consumption in the game. Explicit/vulgar language may appear in the dialogues within the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+ 64 bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600 or similar
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB or similar
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible audio card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10+ 64 bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 5800X or better
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 12GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 700 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible audio card

short_description: Saddle Up and Drive is a thrilling isometric driving game. In the demo, you can race, smuggle goods, evade the police, and earn loads of cash!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Japanese, Russian, Croatian, Korean
